channel.title: Game Modes you'd like to see in Throne of Lies
channel.description:
The game mode I want to see the most is The cult vs The unseen vs the blue dragon. This will need 20 players and it should come monthly or every once in a month like URF in league of legends.
What game modes would you like to see ?

item.title: Game Modes you'd like to see in Throne of Lies
item.dc:creator: Bounty
item.description:
Of course a game mode like this would be chaotic and not balanced, that’s the fun of it, Check URF of league of legends that game mode is so chaotic and unbalanced yet people love it, I believe it will be the same with The three factions against each other.

Read full topic
item.source: Game Modes you'd like to see in Throne of Lies

item.title: Game Modes you'd like to see in Throne of Lies
item.dc:creator: Frostwolf103
item.description:
Yeah, that’s problem I am seeing. I would say sixteen BD players, while Cult and Unseen starts with leader/mastermind and assassin/random cult to even the odds.

BD is uninformed majority, but can take up and unite rather quickly if they find early (correct) leads on, while two factions has to blend with the crowd and eventually one faction remains, Cult may be at disadvantage when it comes in night killing, but they have majority in voting, while Unseen doesn’t need to sacrifice a member to make a kill and can always replace with new assassins each time.

Read full topic
item.source: Game Modes you'd like to see in Throne of Lies

item.title: Game Modes you'd like to see in Throne of Lies

item.description:
That way the blue dragon will stand 10% chance, think about it. They’ll keep losing people to conversions + getting killed.

Read full topic

item.title: Game Modes you'd like to see in Throne of Lies
item.dc:creator: Frostwolf103
item.description:
With three factions, all neutrals should be gone while it’s 2vs2vs12 to make it 16, I dunno if increasing the size of 20 players without neutral killers is the best way to do it?

Read full topic
